entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:51 a.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
